wikipedia_page.main: Iain Robert Morrison (born 14 December 1962) is a retired rugby union player who made 15 appearances for the Scotland national rugby union team. He played flanker.

link_mentions.page: List of Scotland national rugby union players

response: *Iain Morrison (rugby union) (born 1962), Scottish rugby union player

Russell (Wasps), G. J. M. Irvine (Harrogate), P. Jones (Gloucester), I. Kirk (London Scottish), D. Butcher (Sale), Jeremy Campbell-Lamerton (London Scottish) [captain], Chris Gray (Nottingham), S.
